short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Seamlessly find compatible track keys based on the Camelot Wheel for perfect DJ mixes and smooth transitions

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Camelot Wheel Key Assistant

Camelot Wheel Assistant , the indispensable Chrome extension crafted specifically for DJs who seek to seamlessly blend their tracks and maintain a perfect harmonic flow during their sets. Whether you're an experienced DJ or just starting out, this extension is designed to enhance your mixing capabilities by providing quick and accurate key suggestions based on the Camelot Wheel system. Elevate your performances and keep your audience dancing all night long with harmonically perfect transitions.

Camelot Wheel Assistant utilizes the renowned Camelot Wheel system, a widely accepted key notation system used by DJs and music producers around the world. This system categorizes musical keys into a circular layout, allowing for intuitive understanding and selection of compatible keys. With this extension, you can effortlessly navigate and utilize this powerful tool to enhance your mixes.

Simply input the key of your current track, and get a list of potential next track keys. The suggestions are based on harmonic compatibility, ensuring smooth transitions and a seamless flow between tracks.
